Hash: SHA1

[quote sgiri1981::on 2/6/2005 10:33 AM]
|
|
| Hi,
| I have been working on JAVA projects and now we want to do automated
| testing using JUnit.
| We will be working on Eclipse 3.0.1.
|
| For this task, can anyone suggest some reading material/best
| practices-- from a beginner's pt of view.
|
| regards
| S.Giri
|

My suggestions:
1/ read all the documentation on JUnit site
2/ after you have an idea about unit testing with JUnit choose one (better both) of
- - JUnit Recipes (the set of recipes presented by J.B. will provide you with the needed info for
writting tests)
- - JUnit in Action (will present you some advanced tricks of JUnit)

- --
:alex |.::the_mindstorm::.|
